Headline: Harlem-bound Green & Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green & Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/delays following earlier signal problems nr Adams/Wabash. Service is resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green and Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running with significant delays and congestion following earlier signal problems near Adams/Wabash.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

As a result of the delayed train, shuttle buses are available as followed:

  • from 35th to Clark/Lake to provide connecting service for the Green line in both directions.
  • from Halsted to Clark/Lake to provide connecting service for the Orange Line in both directions.

Also, all Orange Line Trains will be rerouted to the outer Loop. Orange Line customers are to board/exit all Orange Line trains on the Brown Line platforms of:

  • Washington/Wells
  • Quincy/Wells
  • LaSalle/Van Buren
  • Harold Washington Library-State/Van Buren
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Washington/Wabash
  • State/Lake
  • Clark/Lake

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.


Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
